page.title: 01Landscape view of Stithians
page.content: Stithians is a rural area with about a dozen {farms.}It is fairly hilly and includes a pleasant wood. There is a river the Kennall and the village of Ponsanooth which are described separately. Stithians has an agricultural show which is an important annual{event.}There is a primary school which serves the village , children from Ponsanooth have one as well. There are several thousand people living in the village of Stithians served by four shops, a garage, a licenced restaurant and a pub. There are many organizations in Stithians including the band, disco dancing, two choirs as well as the church choir, sports clubs, cubs, brownies and guides. There is one church and two chapels one of which is closed , which are of historic importance.(Population 2,165 in 1982)
